columns.dc:description: The name of the organisation to which the dataset relates.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) which identifies the organisation.
Date at which the information provided is true, in the ISO international date format YYYY-MM-DD.
Street name and area where the car park is located.
Postcode where the car park is located.
The total number of parking spaces available within the car park.
The number of parking spaces specifically marked out as a disabled parking bay.
Information relating to the terms of use of the car park e.g. time limits, applicable charges etc.
TRUE or FALSE indicating whether parking is available free of charge (subject to the terms mentioned in ParkingRestrictions).
TRUE or FALSE indicating whether parking is subject to a charge (subject to the terms mentioned in ParkingRestrictions).
The number of charging points for electric vehicles.
